Input: Student Supply List

7 and 8 Graders: Bring these supplies with you on the first day of school, Auaust O.
1 Backpack — no larger than 21" tall by 12" wide — no wheels*

Input: 1 Scientific calculator with name clearly labeled on calculator (not just the case)
(Texas Instruments model #TI 30XIIS Solar for students new to middle school)
1 Pencil box or bag —student choice
4 Fine line colored markers or pens for correcting

2 Fine point black Sharpies
1 pair Fiskars student scissors — 5"
1 Set of headphones
These may be earbuds compatible with Apple devices and must include a microphone.
